overview: A photograph taken in 2012 of people on board a boat after swimming at the beach is made into an oil painting in 2013. Finally, the photograph and the painting are made into a film. The director presents parts of artistic pieces by zooming on each work, before showing the entirety later. Under the same title, the photograph and painting convey instants and stories captured in different media, and the film becomes a medium that integrate the other ones based on enriched narrativity.
title: On Board
